comment._content: Hi, this photo is being discussed in one of the projects in the Flickr Commons group, and we'd love to have this added to the group pool!

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Robert Henri (25 June 1865 – 12 July 1929) was an American painter of the Ashcan School movement in art. Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Henri
